title: Active Data Studio 8.0.0
description:
Active@ Data Studio (Live CD) contains a set of both desktop applications and a bootable image for booting up any system into a DOS or Windows environment. Whether you need to perform data recovery, data imaging, or to securely erase data, Active@ Data Studio allows you to run the utilities from within Windows or to boot a system up from a self-contained boot environment.

Windows Edition
 Active@ Disk Image
 Active@ File Recovery
 Active@ Partition Manager
 Active@ Partition Recovery
 Active@ Hard Disk Monitor
 Active@ HEX Editor
 Active@ Password Changer
 Active@ KillDisk
 Active@ Data CD/DVD Burner
DOS Edition
 Active@ UNERASER
 Active@ KillDisk
 Active@ Partition Recovery
 Active@ Password Changer
 NTFS Reader
 Active@ Disk Image

System Requirements:
 v Windows 8 
 v Windows 7
 v Windows Vista (32 bit/64 bit)
 v Windows Server 2008
 v Windows XP
 v Windows XP Professional x64
 v Windows XP Home x64 
 v Windows Server 2003 
 v Windows Server 2000
 v Windows 98 
 v Windows ME
 v Windows NT
 v FAT12, FAT16, FAT32, NTFS, NTFS5, NTFS+EFS file systems
 v Advanced search of deleted files
 v All types of Flash Memory Cards
 v Localized and long filenames
 v Compressed, encrypted and fragmented files on NTFS
 v IDE / ATA / SCSI drives

Homepage: www.lsoft.net/data-studio.aspx
